prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a round body and a spiky exterior.
Generate a steel-type creature that resembles a fortress with metallic elements.
Imagine a Pokemon with a shell-like body and sharp features for defense.
Design a Pokemon that blends into forest environments with earthy colors.
Show me a sturdy Pokemon that can withstand attacks with a strong outer shell.
Give me a Pokemon that has an armored appearance and is known for its resilience.
Make a Pokemon that can camouflage in grasslands with a combination of red and gray.
